#### Python Template

Basic Python script template with best practices.

```python
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Script Description
Author: Your Name
Date: YYYY-MM-DD
"""

def main():
    """Main function."""
    pass

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

## Tools & Software

### Required Software

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Python

**Python 3.9+**

Install from [python.org](https://www.python.org/downloads/)

**Required Packages**:
```bash
pip install pandas numpy matplotlib scikit-learn jupyter
```

## R

**R 4.2+** and **RStudio**

- [Download R](https://www.r-project.org/)
- [Download RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/)

**Required Packages**:
```r
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "ggplot2", "dplyr"))
```

## IDE

**Recommended IDEs**:

- [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) - Free, powerful
- [PyCharm](https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/) - Python-focused
- [JupyterLab](https://jupyter.org/) - Interactive notebooks

:::

## Citation

If you use materials from this course in your work, please cite:

::: {.callout-note}
## Citation Format

**APA**:
```
Author, A. (Year). Course Title. Institution. https://course-url.com
```

**BibTeX**:
```bibtex
@misc{coursename2025,
  author = {Your Name},
  title = {Course Title},
  year = {2025},
  publisher = {Institution},
  url = {https://course-url.com}
}
```

:::
